[[WP:UNDO|Undid]] revision 310801400 by [[Special:Contributions/Aherlow|Aherlow]] ([[User talk:Aherlow|talk]]) - Removing apparent Original Research per [[WP:OR]]. P.S., don't sign in articles please (using [[User:EpochFail/NICE|NICE]])
[[WP:UNDO|Undid]] revision 308949396 by [[Special:Contributions/Slinky317|Slinky317]] ([[User talk:Slinky317|talk]]New names begin at street level. Google is not the source of all truth..
The company is Canadian, not the line of devices
/* Nicknames */ Removed the "Blackberry Blink" reference. There's no citations saying that it's popular, and a simple google search for the term doesn't even come up with that meaning.
The entry of a new street level term 'BlackBerry Blink' referring to 'that instant light up of the BlackBerry screen that engages the user in speedy and direct communication'.
/* BlackBerry Messenger */ Added punctuation and fixed a misspelling
Removed POV box. There is no section on the talk page disputing the article's neutrality. Anyone that objects, please set out your reasoning on the talk page.
